unnormalised: **EdTech Buzz: Virtual Classrooms - The New Normal, Yaar?**
normalised: **EdTech Buzz: Virtual Classrooms - The New Normal, Yaar?**

unnormalised: Hey folks! Remember rushing to school in the scorching Delhi heat? Well, thanks to virtual classrooms, those days might be fading faster than your mom's patience when you spill chai on the rug!
normalised: Hey folks! Remember rushing to school in the scorching Delhi heat? Well, thanks to virtual classrooms, those days might be fading faster than your mom's patience when you spill chai on the rug!

unnormalised: Seriously though, EdTech is booming! More and more schools, from tiny villages in Rajasthan to posh institutions in Mumbai, are embracing online learning. It's not just about attending classes on your laptop anymore. We're talking interactive whiteboards, AI-powered tutoring, and even virtual field trips!
normalised: Seriously though, EdTech is booming! More and more schools, from tiny villages in Rajasthan to posh institutions in Mumbai, are embracing online learning. It's not just about attending classes on your laptop anymore. We are talking interactive whiteboards, A I-powered tutoring, and even virtual field trips!

unnormalised: Teachers are adapting, too. Mrs. Sharma from St. Joseph's says, "It was tough at first, but now my students are even more engaged!"
normalised: Teachers are adapting, too. Missus Sharma from Saint Joseph's says, "It was tough at first, but now my students are even more engaged!"

unnormalised: Think about it – learning about the Taj Mahal through a 3D virtual tour instead of just a dusty textbook? Pretty cool, right?
normalised: Think about it – learning about the Taj Mahal through a three D virtual tour instead of just a dusty textbook? Pretty cool, right?

unnormalised: Plus, it's accessible! Kids in remote areas can now get quality education.
normalised: Plus, it is accessible! Kids in remote areas can now get quality education.

unnormalised: And hey, who says you can't enjoy a plate of delicious biryani while attending your history class? Just remember to mute your mic, okay? Happy Onam to all who are celebrating!
normalised: And hey, who says you can not enjoy a plate of delicious biryani while attending your history class? Just remember to mute your mic, okay? Happy Onam to all who are celebrating!

unnormalised: The future of learning is here, and it's online, my friends!
normalised: The future of learning is here, and it is online, my friends!
